author: Jessica Hinchliffe
title: When working from home means caring for 100 eight-legged friends
description: While many of us spend our workday at home following Zoom meetings and email trails, Eamon Amsters is filling up the hours keeping more than 50 spiders alive for the Queensland Museum.
content:
